short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and discover the best AI prompts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Prompts Club Chrome Extension is your go-to tool for managing and discovering top AI prompts across platforms like ChatGPT and Midjourney. Capture prompts from any website, organize them for quick access, and explore a curated marketplace filled with prompts shared by an active community of AI enthusiasts.

✨Key Features:

💾 Save AI Prompts: Easily save prompts from any webpage by selecting text and right-clicking. 

📂 Manage Prompts: Access and organize all your saved prompts in a user-friendly side panel. 

🌟 Discover Prompts: Explore a dynamic marketplace of high-quality prompts created by the community. 

🔗 Easy Integration: Seamless integration with Chrome's side panel for quick access and smooth workflow. 

🔍 Intuitive Search: Quickly find the perfect prompt with powerful search functionality to enhance your productivity.

Boost your AI workflows and creativity by managing all your favorite prompts in one convenient place with Prompts Club!
